question: Consider the real-world 3D location of the objects. Which object is closer to the camera?
question_with_options:
Consider the real-world 3D location of the objects. Which object is closer to the camera?
A. laptop
B. remote control
C. None
D. None
triage_reason: The laptop is positioned on a wooden stand directly in front of the viewer, while the remote control is on a patterned rug further back in the scene, making the laptop clearly closer.
